messages.subject: Interesting interview
messages.msgSnippet: .  The first question is How different are the Perrys from the Osbournes?  Answer?  Ozzy goes on the road and the kids stay home.  We all go.  We
messages.messageBody:
. The first question is "How different are the
Perrys from the Osbournes?" Answer? "Ozzy goes on the road and the kids
stay home. We all go. We home-school our kids."

That's cool....I think. I am thinking Ozzy is probably better off not
homeschooling his kids :)
I remember a conversation (was it here) some months ago about someone
watching the Osbournes show. The usual weirdness was going on and the kids
were mad about being freaks on tv and getting teased at school....Ozzy said
something about homeschooling them.
The poster of this information said something about how she would have loved
to see an HSLDA leader watching that (ice tea spew for sure!)
That image has stayed with me!! Too funny.

Ren
